Method.name: main
Method.Implementation:
#dim gol As Gol #dim focus As Focus #dim uno As Uno

Set focus = ##class(FabricaCarro).criarCarro( ##class(ModeloCarro).#FOCUS ) Write !,focus.getInfo()
Set uno = ##class(FabricaCarro).criarCarro( ##class(ModeloCarro).#UNO ) Write !,uno.getInfo()
